description: The Tind 1/4 Zip Pullover is part of our basics collection which is knitted of 100% Superfine Italian Spun Merino. A timeless 1/4 zip style with a stand up collar, easy to wear casual, dress or lounge. The Superfine Merino creates the perfect weight for all occasions and lends itself to an extremely soft hand. Designed in Norway, made in China.
name: We Norwegians Tind Zip Up - Mens
